text: Spartan is a 2004 action thriller film written and directed by David Mamet. It features Val Kilmer, Derek Luke, Tia Texada, Ed O'Neill, William H. Macy, and Kristen Bell. It was released in the United States and Canada on 12 March 2004. The film generated more than $25 million in home video rentals in the United States (significantly higher than the film's US box office gross).
